instructions.en: Turn left to stay on Cool highway
instructions.es: Turn izquierda to stay on Cool highway
instructions.fr: Continuer à gauche sur Cool highway
instructions.it: Continua a sinistra per stare su Cool highway
instructions.pt-BR: Continue à esquerda em Cool highway
instructions.ru: Продолжите движение налево по Cool highway
instructions.sv: Sväng vänster och fortsätt på Cool highway
instructions.vi: Quẹo trái để chạy tiếp trên Cool highway
